text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Forget testing, ventilators, and PPE. Trump’s big plan to beat COVID-19 involved distributing millions of doses of the unproven hydroxychloroquine to New York and New Jersey. Behind the scenes, senior administration officials pushed hard to bend the rules and back up his boasts.
